Sentencas: A thorough investigation of the thermodynamics and economic performance of a cogeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cells that provides heat and power to homes has been carried out in this study.
Titulo: Modelling of hydrogen blending into the UK natural gas network driven by a solid oxide fuel cell for electricity and district heating system

Sentencas: Additionally, different percentages of green hydrogen have been blended with natural gas to examine the techno-economic performance of the suggested cogeneration system.
Titulo: Modelling of hydrogen blending into the UK natural gas network driven by a solid oxide fuel cell for electricity and district heating system

Sentencas: The energy and exergy efficiency of the system rises steadily as the hydrogen blending percentage rises from 0% to 20%, then slightly drops at 50% H2 blending, and then rises steadily again until 100% H2 supply.
Titulo: Modelling of hydrogen blending into the UK natural gas network driven by a solid oxide fuel cell for electricity and district heating system

Sentencas: The system's minimal levelised cost of energy was calculated to be 4.64 & POUND;/kWh for 100% H2.
Titulo: Modelling of hydrogen blending into the UK natural gas network driven by a solid oxide fuel cell for electricity and district heating system

Sentencas: Artificial Neural Network (ANN) model was also used to further train a sizable quantity of data that was received from the simulation model.
Titulo: Modelling of hydrogen blending into the UK natural gas network driven by a solid oxide fuel cell for electricity and district heating system

Sentencas: Heat, power, and levelised cost of energy estimates using the ANN model were found to be extremely accurate, with coefficients of determination of 0.99918, 0.99999, and 0.99888, respectively.
Titulo: Modelling of hydrogen blending into the UK natural gas network driven by a solid oxide fuel cell for electricity and district heating system
